relatedBlades.title: Secure hybrid work with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Explore specific hybrid work use cases that our cloud-native services can help you achieve.
relatedBlades.copy:
Securing hybrid work involves many security disciplines and requires attention and collaboration across your entire business. 

See how Cloudflare delivers on your use cases and simplifies key security processes.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a person working from home with Cloudflare swag

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud simplifies remote workforce security
relatedBlades.subheadline: Our composable platform and network make it easier to secure any connection, so users on any device in any location can stay safe and productive using applications and the Internet

columnContent.title: Composable architecture
columnContent.description: Meet any unique use case with full API programmability and customizable logging and routing

columnContent.title: Integration
columnContent.description: Preserve user experiences with single-pass inspection and a network that's 50 ms from 95% of Internet users

columnContent.title: Threat intelligence
columnContent.description: Block more threats  known and unknown  with intelligence gleaned from proxying ~20% of the web and blocking %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats

columnContent.title: Unified interface
columnContent.description: Reduce tool sprawl and alert fatigue by uniting all remote workforce security services in one UI

relatedBlades.description: How to evaluate SASE platforms for high-priority use cases

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Canva uses Cloudflare to protects its
3500+ employee hybrid workforce

content.value: Canva needed an effective way to manage and protect application usage across its global user base of 3500 employees and multiple third-party agencies.
With Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare's ZTNA service, Canva's security teams find it much easier to onboard and offboard new users, and to track their network activity.

Cloudflare Access saved us from having to develop our own Identity and Access Management (IAM) systemwe wanted to give employees different levels of permissions in CanvaWorld, and Access lets us do that easily."

buttonOne.elementName: Request a Zero Trust workshop zero-trust/plans/enterprise btn
